protocol.name: P-G14420-1
protocol.text: Plants or seeds for all experiments were kept in a growth room at 22° C with a day:night period of 16:8-hrs and fluorescent lighting  levels of ~75E.

protocol.name: P-G14420-2
protocol.text: Plants or seeds were placed in anaerobic microbial chambers (Oxoid, Adelaide, SA, Australia) and the chambers were flushed with a gas mixture of 0.1% Oxygen, balance Nitrogen at a flow rate of ~10L/min. for 20 minutes. Chambers were then sealed.

protocol.name: P-G14420-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 7 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G14420-4
protocol.text: Plants or seeds were flash frozen and ground in liquid nitrogen.
